TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWSTrustContract

summary.span: 定義用來將 WS-Trust 訊息傳送至 STS 的服務合約。

span.span: Defines the service contract for sending WS-Trust messages to an STS.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginCancel (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message, AsyncCallback callback, object asyncState);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginCancel(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object asyncState) cil managed
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginCancel(System::ServiceModel::Channels::Message ^ message, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ asyncState);

param.name: message
param.span: ，表示包含 RST 的要求訊息。

span.span: A that represents the request message, which contains the RST.

param.name: callback
param.span: 選擇性的 委派，會在傳送完成時呼叫。

span.span: An optional delegate, to be called when the send is complete.

param.name: asyncState
param.span: 使用者所提供的物件，其可以從其他要求中區分出這個特定非同步傳送要求。

span.span: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous send request from other requests.

summary.span: WS-Trust 取消繫結的非同步開始方法。

span.span: The asynchronous begin method for the WS-Trust Cancel binding.

returns.span: 物件，表示可能還在暫止中的非同步傳送。

span.span: An object that represents the asynchronous send, which could still be pending.
